concept.title: Comparison Window
concept.shortdesc: The Deduplicator compares records up to a user-defined limit. It can also perform comparisons within a window of time.

conbody.p: The Deduplicator compares records until it reaches the record limit. Then, it discards the information kept in memory and starts fresh. You can configure a time limit to trigger a refresh at regular time intervals.
When you stop the pipeline, the Deduplicator discards all information in memory.
